feed.title: HandBrake Web Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for HandBrake Web: v0.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feature: stopped job state the user can trigger via the client or when a job is interrupted on the server/client by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3.0

entry.title: New release for HandBrake Web: v0.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump ws, engine.io, socket.io-adapter and engine.io-client by @dependabot in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/2
  • feature: remove jobs from the queue via the client by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/8
  • feat: adding icons to the sidebar navigation buttons by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/17
  • feature: store queue status in the database to persist queue status between restarts by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/18
  • feat: updates to the create-job, path-input, and file-browser elements to use a new custom asynchronous backend for getting directory information by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/19
  • feature: enable recursive directory searching when adding new jobs via directory mode in the create-job overlay by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/23
  • feature: updates to the results section of the create-job overlay by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/24
  • feat: switching queue to an event based system rather than polling by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/28
  • fix: resolved issues regarding input/output paths in the create job dialogue by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/30
  • fix: don't show 'see-more' in create-job dialogue when there aren't more than 5 items by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/31
  • fix: workers will search for a new job once finished with their current one by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/33
  • refactor: use tsconfig.json "paths" property to reduce instances of deep relative path referencing by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/35

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

entry.title: New release for HandBrake Web: v0.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: queue status will be set to idle when there are available workers but no available jobs by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/41
  • feature: add suppoort for config.yaml to load configuration properties on the server and client by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/44
  • chore: remove unused directory-tree package and references by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/45
  • feature: adding capability to add folders from the client's file-browser by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/47
  • feat: database variable never returns null by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/48
  • feat: show fps and eta metrics for jobs in the queue on the client by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/51
  • feat: improvements to dashboard presentation, focusing on the queue section by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/52
  • feat: adding time started/finished properties to job types, allows display of time elapsed in the client by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/53
  • feature: overhaul presentation of preset information in the presets section with tabs and all available fields by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/54
  • feat: create separate docker images for the server and the worker by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/55
  • feature: add directory monitoring/watching capabilities to allow the automatic creation of jobs by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/63

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

entry.title: New release for HandBrake Web: v0.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: rename the majority of type files & their type definitions to directly indicate something is a type when imported by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/66
  • refactor: replacing instances of using import with use in sass files where it makes sense by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/67
  • feature: move name collision handling off of the client and onto the server by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/71
  • fix: show import errors in the client, and handle the import of shared types across applications better by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/73
  • feat: use standard name collision handling when watchers create new jobs by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/74
  • feat: refactor queue-job component into queue-card and update the display of certain information fields by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/75
  • feat: add watcher section to the dashboard by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/76
  • feat: a warning will display if a preset with an existing name is uplâ€¦ by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/77
  • feat: files are written to a temporary file while transcoding, users can choose to overwrite existing files when creating a job from the client by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/84
  • feat: make badge-info component that shows additional info when hovered over by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/85
  • fix: allow finished jobs to be reset by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/87
  • feat: display queue-cards in labled & categorized sections based on transcode stage by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/91
  • fix: emit initial transcode status update when job is starting to set job to 'Scanning' by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/92
  • fix: transcoding console logs display in a similar format to the rest of the application by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/94
  • fix: worker will become available for a new job when it's current one is stopped by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/95
  • feat: cleanup temp files from transcoding if a job is stopped/finished by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/97
  • feat: name collision handling now also checks the queue for any waiting jobs for name conflicts by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/98
  • feat: overhaul job database storage and update programs to use the related new/updated functions and types by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/100
  • feature: allow jobs to be reordered by dragging and dropping from the client by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/101
  • feat: add 'rules' to watchers to allow conditional watching of directories by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/102
  • feat: updating styling for the watcher-card and queue-card components by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/106
  • feat: adding rule count to the watcher section on the dashboard by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/107
  • fix: use system /tmp directory to avoid permissions issues (hopefully) by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for HandBrake Web: v0.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: config template path resolution by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/124
  • fix: error when attempting to load presets if the preset files doesn't exist by @TheNickOfTime in https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/pull/125

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/handbrake-web/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1
